monsters.name: Balor
monsters.skills: Acrobatics +35, Athletics +37, Deception +36, Diplomacy +32, Intimidation +38, Religion +32, Society +32, Stealth +33

abilities.Aura of Flame: [aura] 20 feet. A foe that starts its turn in the aura takes 3d6+10 fire damage, or 6d6+20 fire damage if the balor has grabbed or restrained it. A creature that hits a balor with an unarmed Strike takes 3d6+10 fire damage, and weapons that hit a balor take 3d6+10 fire damage.
abilities.Attack of Opportunity: [reaction] The balor can use Attack of Opportunity when a creature within their reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to its normal trigger. They can disrupt triggering concentrate actions, and they disrupt actions on any hit, not just a critical hit.
abilities.Death Throes: When a balor dies, their body explodes in a 100-foot aura of intense demonic flame. All creatures and objects in range take 16d10 fire damage (DC 45 basic Reflex save). Because the flame is infused with Abyssal energy, creatures in the area apply only half their usual fire resistance. Creatures with immunity to fire use an outcome one degree of success better than what they rolled, instead of gaining the usual benefit of immunity. The bodies of creatures reduced to 0 Hit Points by a balor’s death throes are completely incinerated into fine ash.
abilities.Vorpal Cold Iron Silver Longsword: [one action] Melee +40 [+35/+30] (evil, magical, reach 10 feet, versatile P), Damage 4d8+17 slashing plus 1d6 evil
abilities.Cold Iron Silver Flame Whip: [one action] +40 [+35/+30] (disarm, evil, fire, magical, reach 20 feet, trip), Damage 4d6+17 fire plus 1d6 evil, Improved Grab, and whip reposition
abilities.Whip Reposition: When a balor grabs a creature with a whip Strike, they can move the creature to any space in the whip’s reach. The balor can move without ending the grab as long as the creature remains within the whip’s reach, and the balor can move the creature to any other space in the whip’s reach with an Interact action.
